name: Per-User Configuration, Image Webhooks, and URL Reader Tool
objective: Add user settings storage, /config slash command with webhooks, modify image tool for webhook routing, and create URL reader tool
exit_criteria: user-settings.ts repository with typed getters/setters exported from @core/database
/config command handles view, api-key, chat-model, image-models, reset, webhook subcommands
webhook.ts helper sends content/embeds/files to Discord webhooks with test function
image-generation.tool.ts sends to webhook when webhookSend=true
ai.plugin.ts uses user's API key if configured
url-reader.tool.ts extracts content from URLs safely
